title: Cowboy Hill (American football)
text: Harry Franklin "Cowboy" Hill (March 30, 1899 – February 3, 1966) was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> <a href="Running%20back">tailback</a> who played four seasons with the <a href="Toledo%20Maroons">Toledo Maroons</a>, <a href="Kansas%20City%20Blues/Cowboys">Kansas City Blues/Cowboys</a> and <a href="New%20York%20Giants">New York Giants</a> of the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a>. He played <a href="college%20football">college football</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Oklahoma">University of Oklahoma</a> and attended <a href="Chickasha%20High%20School">Chickasha High School</a> in <a href="Chickasha%2C%20Oklahoma">Chickasha, Oklahoma</a>.
